body:
Hey guys!
So, I wanted to open youtube channel, so i need help from you guys!
The first, For profile youtube head i need my avicus profile head, so i updated my skin, and 3 days my head is staying the older skin.
Second, i need Good Recording software with no lags, and free.
Another thing, I really want good program for editing my videos, Puting music in, cutting, putting effects.
And the last thing, Personal help, If you can, Recommend on good microphone for records. 
Thanks! :D
body_tagged:

title: Help.

replies.body: Obs is a amazing recording software (better than fraps) and is free. If you have to go to ocn and there head photos update for sure. Movie maker on windows is okayish but if we want a good you you have to pay(or crack it) I suggest the latest Sony Vegas. I don't really have much suggestions for a good microphone but overall if you enjoy what you are doing your videos will be great.

Movie maker on windows is okayish but if we want a good you you have to pay(or crack it) I suggest the latest Sony Vegas. I don't really have much suggestions for a good microphone but overall if you enjoy what you are doing your videos will be great.

replies.body:
Get Camtasia Studio.. :3
It comes with a 30-day free trial and is really actually a lot of fun to edit your videos with. It's simple, straight-forward, and quite easy to get the hang of. I've never tried Sony Vegas because Camtasia is so dang good :D

replies.body: I use bandicam, usually lowers my fps by 10 fps so it isn't that bad xD <3 , I use a logitech microphone that I got from Target which costed 15$, I use pinnacle studio 17 which is made by the same people as sony vegas pro (corel), and is 200$ less (it is 100$ for pinnacle and 300$ for sony vegas pro)
